SELECT bp.name, CASE WHEN bp.sex = 1 THEN '男' WHEN bp.sex = 0 THEN '女' ELSE '未知' END AS gender, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,bp.birthday,CURDATE()) as age, hd.dname, bd.disease, bpia.quantity, bpia.treatment_quantity, bo.create_time as outpatient_time, bc.create_time, bc.ts_name, bc.id, bc.patient_id, bc.outpatient_id, bc.entity_id, bc.cure_user_id, bc.registrant_id, bc.signature_id, bc.department_id, bc.customer_id, bc.ts_description FROM bu_cure bc LEFT JOIN bu_patient bp ON bc.patient_id = bp.id AND bp.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN hs_department hd ON bc.department_id = hd.id AND hd.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN bu_outpatient bo ON bc.outpatient_id = bo.id AND bo.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN bu_prescription_item_appointment bpia ON bc.prescription_item_id = bpia.prescription_item_id AND bpia.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN bu_diagnose bd ON bc.outpatient_id = bd.outpatient_id WHERE bc.is_del = 0 AND bc.status = 2
AND (bp.name LIKE concat('%',#{buCureSearchRO.search},'%') OR bp.phone LIKE concat('%',#{buCureSearchRO.search},'%'))
AND bc.department_id = #{buCureSearchRO.departmentId}
AND (bc.create_time between #{buCureSearchRO.cureStartDate} AND {buCureSearchRO.cureEndDate})
ORDER BY bc.create_time DESC

SELECT bp.name, CASE WHEN bp.sex = 1 THEN '男' WHEN bp.sex = 0 THEN '女' ELSE '未知' END AS gender, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,bp.birthday,CURDATE()) as age, bd.disease, bd.syndrome, bpi.prescription_id, bo.create_time as outpatient_time,
bc.id, bc.patient_id, bc.outpatient_id, bc.entity_id, bc.cure_user_id, bc.registrant_id, bc.signature_id, bc.ts_description, bc.create_time, bc.ts_name, bc.status, hu.user_name AS cureUserName FROM bu_cure bc LEFT JOIN bu_patient bp ON bc.patient_id = bp.id AND bp.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN bu_outpatient bo ON bc.outpatient_id = bo.id AND bo.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN bu_prescription_item bpi ON bc.prescription_item_id = bpi.id AND bpi.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN bu_diagnose bd ON bc.outpatient_id = bd.outpatient_id LEFT JOIN hs_user hu ON bc.cure_user_id = hu.id AND hu.is_del = 0 WHERE bc.is_del = 0 and bc.signature_id = #{signatureId}
